# Unicode.GeneralCategory.initialPunctuation

**Case**

An initial quotation mark.

## Declaration

```swift
case initialPunctuation
```

## Discussion

This value corresponds to the category `Initial_Punctuation` (abbreviated `Pi`) in the [https://unicode.org/reports/tr44/#General_Category_Values].
title: Unicode.GeneralCategory.initialPunctuation
